room_title: Escape room "Mission Critical" by Escape For Fun in Chicago
review: I've done several escape rooms and we took newbies with us to try this facility out. Mission Critical was a good time for both veterans and newbies. The puzzles were interesting and the props were great! Would definitely come back for other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Mission Critical" by Escape For Fun in Chicago
review: This was my 5th escape room experience, so I have a few under my belt now for comparison. The theme, story line, and room d√©cor were well done and clues were challenging but not unsolvable. My team escaped with 2 minutes to spare. Bravo on a fun experience!

room_title: Escape room "Mission Critical" by Escape For Fun in Chicago
review: My family and I escaped from the room, "Mission Critical" and had SO MUCH FUN! Best escape room in the area. So many puzzles and coolInteractive surprises! I would absolutely recommend this room!
